description: This file contains the styles for the Navbar component, defining its layout, appearance, and responsiveness.

classes.name: navbar-root
classes.description: Root container for the navbar, setting its background, height, and layout properties.

classes.name: navbar-title
classes.description: Styles for the navbar title, including color, weight, size, and spacing.

classes.name: navbar-nav
classes.description: Styles for the navigation list in the navbar, including display properties and spacing.

classes.name: navbar-link
classes.description: Styles for individual navigation links, including color, hover effects, and padding.

classes.name: navbar-avatar-placeholder
classes.description: Placeholder styles for avatar, setting dimensions and background color.
